Type(s) of content in package: Dynamically updated estimates of global surface temperature change, updated around the middle of every month using current data files from NOAA GHCN v3 (meteorological stations), ERSST v4 (ocean areas), and SCAR (Antarctic stations).
significance: Dynamically updated estimates of global surface temperature change, updated around the middle of every month using current data files from NOAA GHCN v3 (meteorological stations), ERSST v4 (ocean areas), and SCAR (Antarctic stations).
title: GISS Surface Temperature Analysis (GISTEMP)
